title: What They Saw
description: NBC News’ Dennis Murphy speaks to a Georgia father accused of murdering his ex-wife. While his friends come together to prove he is innocent, prosecutors count on his young children to testify against their own father.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
